author: Timothy B. Lee
title: COVID-19 tests are going unused due to hospital IT challenges
description: Lab director: Hospitals are “astonishingly unprepared” to deal with academic labs.
content:
15 with 14 posters participating
Testing is one of the most important tools for getting the coronavirus pandemic under control in the United States. More than 160,000 COVID-19 tests were performed in the US on Thursday, according to the COVID Tracking Projec… [+2546 chars]
